page.title: 05Meeson.
page.content:
In{Meeson}there are five farms and one farm cottage. There are about a dozen houses. Most of the houses are not modern, but some have modern extensions. Many of the people work outside Meeson.
The{farmers}mainly grow potatoes, sugar beet, wheat and barley. There is a{market gardener}who sells his produce at the door and at Wellington market.
{ Primary school}children go to Crudgington,but there is only one at the moment. Older children go to Charlton school or to Blessed Robert Johnson.
One man in Meeson sells{antique {machinery.
